title: Evangelism, Forgiveness, Is God of the OT a Flawed Character?
description:
Paul takes questions via the Discord server. To participate go here https://discord.gg/tqVbg3y6 Submit question in writing or ask live in the voice chat

Time stamps:

0:02:10  Intro and two week vacation announcement
0:03:50  Would PVK do YT Atheist convo again plus commentary?
0:07:05  To see God and live: did Moses see Jesus or God’s back?
0:11:35  What is evangelism and where do I send donations?
0:19:05  Should there be equal focus on being forgiven as to forgive?
0:35:40  Is Jesus the solution to a flawed God of the OT?
0:51:20  What’s PVK’s greatest disappointment in his YouTube career?
0:54:05  What’s PVK’s fondest experience?
1:02:40  What’s PVK’s most unexpected revelation 
1:05:45  What’s PVK’s hope for the future?
1:11:05  What’s PVK’s take on total depravity?
1:12:05  What does: “I’ll write on Him my new name,” mean (Revelation)?
1:18:15  Does Jesus connect name with unity?   
1:28:30  Is there a relation between civil war of churches and war threats? 
1:31:30  Caller with different Orthodox Church experiences
1:35:15  What prayers should I say before going to bed?
1:38:55  Super chats and Taco’s  
1:40:00  Will technology revive the pagan world? 
1:42:35  How does an atheist make a choice of religion?
1:50:45  Can we feel and express righteous anger like Christ?
1:52:45  Is formation of Israel fulfillment of prophecies?
1:54:00  How can a father lead his family in spiritual matters?
1:59:20  Can rando video’s be posted here during vacation?
2:00:20  What are PVK’s thoughts on Christian mysticism?
2:01:40   Give new names vs give nick names
2:08:10  What does walking in forgiveness mean?
